info.description:
A simple HTTP Request & Response Service.

Run locally: $ docker run -p 80:80 kennethreitz/httpbin
info.title: httpbin.org

get.summary: Absolutely 302 Redirects n times.

delete.summary: Returns anything passed in request data.

get.summary: Returns anything passed in request data.

patch.summary: Returns anything passed in request data.

post.summary: Returns anything passed in request data.

trace.summary: Returns anything passed in request data.

get.summary: Decodes base64url-encoded string.
Prompts the user for authorization using HTTP Basic Auth.
Prompts the user for authorization using bearer authentication.
Returns Brotli-encoded data.
Returns n random bytes generated with given seed
Returns a 304 if an If-Modified-Since header or If-None-Match is present. Returns the same as a GET otherwise.
Sets a Cache-Control header for n seconds.
Returns cookie data.
Deletes cookie(s) as provided by the query string and redirects to cookie list.
Sets cookie(s) as provided by the query string and redirects to cookie list.

200.description: Set cookies and redirects to cookie list.

get.summary: Sets a cookie and redirects to cookie list.
Returns Deflate-encoded data.

delete.summary: Returns a delayed response (max of 10 seconds).

get.summary: Returns a delayed response (max of 10 seconds).

patch.summary: Returns a delayed response (max of 10 seconds).

post.summary: Returns a delayed response (max of 10 seconds).

put.summary: Returns a delayed response (max of 10 seconds).

trace.summary: Returns a delayed response (max of 10 seconds).

get.summary: Returns page denied by robots.txt rules.
Prompts the user for authorization using Digest Auth.
Prompts the user for authorization using Digest Auth + Algorithm.
Prompts the user for authorization using Digest Auth + Algorithm.

parameters.description: The amount of time (in seconds) over which to drip each byte
parameters.name: duration

parameters.description: The number of bytes to respond with
parameters.name: numbytes

parameters.description: The response code that will be returned
parameters.name: code

parameters.description: The amount of time (in seconds) to delay before responding
parameters.name: delay

get.summary: Drips data over a duration after an optional initial delay.
Returns a UTF-8 encoded body.
Assumes the resource has the given etag and responds to If-None-Match and If-Match headers appropriately.
The request's query parameters.
Returns GZip-encoded data.
Return the incoming request's HTTP headers.
Prompts the user for authorization using HTTP Basic Auth.
Returns a simple HTML document.
Returns a simple image of the type suggest by the Accept header.
Returns a simple JPEG image.
Returns a simple PNG image.
Returns a simple SVG image.
Returns a simple WEBP image.
Returns the requester's IP Address.
Returns a simple JSON document.
Generate a page containing n links to other pages which do the same.
Streams n random bytes generated with given seed, at given chunk size per packet.
302/3XX Redirects to the given URL.
302 Redirects n times.
Relatively 302 Redirects n times.
Returns a set of response headers from the query string.

post.summary: Returns a set of response headers from the query string.

get.summary: Returns some robots.txt rules.

delete.summary: Return status code or random status code if more than one are given

get.summary: Return status code or random status code if more than one are given

get.summary: Streams n random bytes generated with given seed, at given chunk size per packet.
Stream n JSON responses
Return the incoming requests's User-Agent header.
Return a UUID4.
Returns a simple XML document.
